HeroSection.Title: PowerPulse - your personal training assistant
HeroSection.Description: Create, customize and monitor your workout lists with ease with PowerPulse. Regardless of your fitness level, you can reach new heights in your workout routine with our site. Mark your progress, customize your workouts to your needs, and reach your goals with us!

MetaData.Title: My Exercise List | PowerPulse
MetaData.Description: Browse and manage the exercises you've created for your training sessions

MetaData.Title: Create New Exercise | PowerPulse
MetaData.Description: Create a new exercise to add to your training routine

Labels.Name: Enter exercise name
Labels.MinCount: Enter your minimum number of repetitions
Labels.MaxCount: Enter your maximum number of repetitions
Labels.CountUp: Enter the number of repetition increases
Labels.WeightUp: Enter your  number of weight increases

Tips.Name: Exercise Name
Tips.Weight: Enter the so-called 'Start Point' - the initial weight of your exercise, from which the rest of the values will be based
Tips.Count: The same point as for the weight
Tips.MinCount: The minimum number of repetitions is the number that will be set as the number of repetitions when the maximum point is reached
Tips.MaxCount: The maximum number of repetitions is the so-called maximum point, the number at which the weight increases and resets to the minimum number of repetitions
Tips.CountUp: The number by which the number of repetitions will increase when you press the increase button
Tips.WeightUp: The number by which the weight will increase when the maximum point is reached

MetaData.Title: Workouts | PowerPulse
MetaData.Description: Create and control exercises for your training sessions. Customize your workout routines and track your progress with ease

MetaData.Title: Create Workout | PowerPulse
MetaData.Description: Design and create custom workout routines tailored to your fitness goals. Add exercises and track your progress

Labels.Name: Enter workout name
Labels.Exercises: Select the exercises to be included in your workout
